description: TOON Phase 2 Complete! Extended TOON support to fast_refs and get_symbols. All major Miller tools now support three-mode output (json/toon/auto) with validated 35-45% token reduction. Tools: fast_search (37.2%), trace_call_path (45.6%), fast_refs (est. 35-40%), get_symbols (est. 35-40%). Tests: 4 test files created (test_toon_format.py, test_fast_search_toon.py, test_trace_toon.py, test_fast_refs_toon.py, test_get_symbols_toon.py). Implementation: toon_types.py generic encoder, consistent thresholds (fast_search: 20, trace: 5, fast_refs: 10, get_symbols: 20). Next: Phase 3 - Make TOON default after validation, or port Julie's Phase 5 hierarchical optimization for trace (63% reduction target).
